title: England have the mentality to win Euros - White
summary: Former England striker and Euro 2022 winner Ellen White believes the Lionesses have the mentality to win the Euro 2025 final against Spain on Sunday.

title: Drop James? Start Mead? How do England beat Spain?
summary: BBC Sport pundits Fara Williams, Ellen White and Josie Henning analyse what England will need to do to beat Spain on Sunday in the Euro 2025 Final.

title: AC Milan sign Brighton defender Estupinan for Â£17m
summary: Ecuadorian international Pervis Estupinan joins Italian side AC Milan in a permanent deal from Brighton.
